00026 struct b3HashString
00027 {
00028         std::string m_string;
00029         unsigned int    m_hash;
00030 
00031         B3_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int getHash()const
00032         {
00033                 return m_hash;
00034         }
00035 
00036 
00037         b3HashString(const char* name)
00038                 :m_string(name)
00039         {
00040 
00041                 /* magic numbers from http://www.isthe.com/chongo/tech/comp/fnv/ */
00042                 static const unsigned int  InitialFNV = 2166136261u;
00043                 static const unsigned int FNVMultiple = 16777619u;
00044 
00045                 /* Fowler / Noll / Vo (FNV) Hash */
00046                 unsigned int hash = InitialFNV;
00047                 int len = m_string.length();
00048                 for(int i = 0; i<len; i++)
00049                 {
00050                         hash = hash ^ (m_string[i]);       /* xor  the low 8 bits */
00051                         hash = hash * FNVMultiple;  /* multiply by the magic number */
00052                 }
00053                 m_hash = hash;
00054         }
00055 
00056         int portableStringCompare(const char* src,      const char* dst) const
00057         {
00058                         int ret = 0 ;
00059 
00060                         while( ! (ret = *(unsigned char *)src - *(unsigned char *)dst) && *dst)
00061                                         ++src, ++dst;
00062 
00063                         if ( ret < 0 )
00064                                         ret = -1 ;
00065                         else if ( ret > 0 )
00066                                         ret = 1 ;
00067 
00068                         return( ret );
00069         }
00070 
00071         bool equals(const b3HashString& other) const
00072         {
00073                 return (m_string == other.m_string);
00074         }
00075 
00076 };
00077

00082 class b3HashInt
00083 {
00084         int     m_uid;
00085 public:
00086         b3HashInt(int uid)      :m_uid(uid)
00087         {
00088         }
00089 
00090         int     getUid1() const
00091         {
00092                 return m_uid;
00093         }
00094 
00095         void    setUid1(int uid)
00096         {
00097                 m_uid = uid;
00098         }
00099 
00100         bool equals(const b3HashInt& other) const
00101         {
00102                 return getUid1() == other.getUid1();
00103         }
00104         //to our success
00105         B3_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int getHash()const
00106         {
00107                 int key = m_uid;
00108                 // Thomas Wang's hash
00109                 key += ~(key << 15);    key ^=  (key >> 10);    key +=  (key << 3);     key ^=  (key >> 6);     key += ~(key << 11);    key ^=  (key >> 16);
00110                 return key;
00111         }
00112 };

00116 class b3HashPtr
00117 {
00118 
00119         union
00120         {
00121                 const void*     m_pointer;
00122                 int     m_hashValues[2];
00123         };
00124 
00125 public:
00126 
00127         b3HashPtr(const void* ptr)
00128                 :m_pointer(ptr)
00129         {
00130         }
00131 
00132         const void*     getPointer() const
00133         {
00134                 return m_pointer;
00135         }
00136 
00137         bool equals(const b3HashPtr& other) const
00138         {
00139                 return getPointer() == other.getPointer();
00140         }
00141 
00142         //to our success
00143         B3_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int getHash()const
00144         {
00145                 const bool VOID_IS_8 = ((sizeof(void*)==8));
00146                 
00147                 int key = VOID_IS_8? m_hashValues[0]+m_hashValues[1] : m_hashValues[0];
00148         
00149                 // Thomas Wang's hash
00150                 key += ~(key << 15);    key ^=  (key >> 10);    key +=  (key << 3);     key ^=  (key >> 6);     key += ~(key << 11);    key ^=  (key >> 16);
00151                 return key;
00152         }
00153 
00154         
00155 };

00223 template <class Key, class Value>
00224 class b3HashMap
00225 {
00226 
00227 protected:
00228         b3AlignedObjectArray<int>               m_hashTable;
00229         b3AlignedObjectArray<int>               m_next;
00230         
00231         b3AlignedObjectArray<Value>             m_valueArray;
00232         b3AlignedObjectArray<Key>               m_keyArray;
00233 
00234         void    growTables(const Key& /*key*/)
00235         {
00236                 int newCapacity = m_valueArray.capacity();
00237 
00238                 if (m_hashTable.size() < newCapacity)
00239                 {
00240                         //grow hashtable and next table
00241                         int curHashtableSize = m_hashTable.size();
00242 
00243                         m_hashTable.resize(newCapacity);
00244                         m_next.resize(newCapacity);
00245 
00246                         int i;
00247 
00248                         for (i= 0; i < newCapacity; ++i)
00249                         {
00250                                 m_hashTable[i] = B3_HASH_NULL;
00251                         }
00252                         for (i = 0; i < newCapacity; ++i)
00253                         {
00254                                 m_next[i] = B3_HASH_NULL;
00255                         }
00256 
00257                         for(i=0;i<curHashtableSize;i++)
00258                         {
00259                                 //const Value& value = m_valueArray[i];
00260                                 //const Key& key = m_keyArray[i];
00261 
00262                                 int     hashValue = m_keyArray[i].getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);      // New hash value with new mask
00263                                 m_next[i] = m_hashTable[hashValue];
00264                                 m_hashTable[hashValue] = i;
00265                         }
00266 
00267 
00268                 }
00269         }
00270 
00271         public:
00272 
00273         void insert(const Key& key, const Value& value) {
00274                 int hash = key.getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00275 
00276                 //replace value if the key is already there
00277                 int index = findIndex(key);
00278                 if (index != B3_HASH_NULL)
00279                 {
00280                         m_valueArray[index]=value;
00281                         return;
00282                 }
00283 
00284                 int count = m_valueArray.size();
00285                 int oldCapacity = m_valueArray.capacity();
00286                 m_valueArray.push_back(value);
00287                 m_keyArray.push_back(key);
00288 
00289                 int newCapacity = m_valueArray.capacity();
00290                 if (oldCapacity < newCapacity)
00291                 {
00292                         growTables(key);
00293                         //hash with new capacity
00294                         hash = key.getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00295                 }
00296                 m_next[count] = m_hashTable[hash];
00297                 m_hashTable[hash] = count;
00298         }
00299 
00300         void remove(const Key& key) {
00301 
00302                 int hash = key.getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00303 
00304                 int pairIndex = findIndex(key);
00305                 
00306                 if (pairIndex ==B3_HASH_NULL)
00307                 {
00308                         return;
00309                 }
00310 
00311                 // Remove the pair from the hash table.
00312                 int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00313                 b3Assert(index != B3_HASH_NULL);
00314 
00315                 int previous = B3_HASH_NULL;
00316                 while (index != pairIndex)
00317                 {
00318                         previous = index;
00319                         index = m_next[index];
00320                 }
00321 
00322                 if (previous != B3_HASH_NULL)
00323                 {
00324                         b3Assert(m_next[previous] == pairIndex);
00325                         m_next[previous] = m_next[pairIndex];
00326                 }
00327                 else
00328                 {
00329                         m_hashTable[hash] = m_next[pairIndex];
00330                 }
00331 
00332                 // We now move the last pair into spot of the
00333                 // pair being removed. We need to fix the hash
00334                 // table indices to support the move.
00335 
00336                 int lastPairIndex = m_valueArray.size() - 1;
00337 
00338                 // If the removed pair is the last pair, we are done.
00339                 if (lastPairIndex == pairIndex)
00340                 {
00341                         m_valueArray.pop_back();
00342                         m_keyArray.pop_back();
00343                         return;
00344                 }
00345 
00346                 // Remove the last pair from the hash table.
00347                 int lastHash = m_keyArray[lastPairIndex].getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00348 
00349                 index = m_hashTable[lastHash];
00350                 b3Assert(index != B3_HASH_NULL);
00351 
00352                 previous = B3_HASH_NULL;
00353                 while (index != lastPairIndex)
00354                 {
00355                         previous = index;
00356                         index = m_next[index];
00357                 }
00358 
00359                 if (previous != B3_HASH_NULL)
00360                 {
00361                         b3Assert(m_next[previous] == lastPairIndex);
00362                         m_next[previous] = m_next[lastPairIndex];
00363                 }
00364                 else
00365                 {
00366                         m_hashTable[lastHash] = m_next[lastPairIndex];
00367                 }
00368 
00369                 // Copy the last pair into the remove pair's spot.
00370                 m_valueArray[pairIndex] = m_valueArray[lastPairIndex];
00371                 m_keyArray[pairIndex] = m_keyArray[lastPairIndex];
00372 
00373                 // Insert the last pair into the hash table
00374                 m_next[pairIndex] = m_hashTable[lastHash];
00375                 m_hashTable[lastHash] = pairIndex;
00376 
00377                 m_valueArray.pop_back();
00378                 m_keyArray.pop_back();
00379 
00380         }
00381 
00382 
00383         int size() const
00384         {
00385                 return m_valueArray.size();
00386         }
00387 
00388         const Value* getAtIndex(int index) const
00389         {
00390                 b3Assert(index < m_valueArray.size());
00391 
00392                 return &m_valueArray[index];
00393         }
00394 
00395         Value* getAtIndex(int index)
00396         {
00397                 b3Assert(index < m_valueArray.size());
00398 
00399                 return &m_valueArray[index];
00400         }
00401 
00402          Key getKeyAtIndex(int index)
00403     {
00404         b3Assert(index < m_keyArray.size());
00405         return m_keyArray[index];
00406     }
00407     
00408     const Key getKeyAtIndex(int index) const
00409     {
00410         b3Assert(index < m_keyArray.size());
00411         return m_keyArray[index];
00412     }
00413 
00414         Value* operator[](const Key& key) {
00415                 return find(key);
00416         }
00417 
00418         const Value*    find(const Key& key) const
00419         {
00420                 int index = findIndex(key);
00421                 if (index == B3_HASH_NULL)
00422                 {
00423                         return NULL;
00424                 }
00425                 return &m_valueArray[index];
00426         }
00427 
00428         Value*  find(const Key& key)
00429         {
00430                 int index = findIndex(key);
00431                 if (index == B3_HASH_NULL)
00432                 {
00433                         return NULL;
00434                 }
00435                 return &m_valueArray[index];
00436         }
00437 
00438 
00439         int     findIndex(const Key& key) const
00440         {
00441                 unsigned int hash = key.getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00442 
00443                 if (hash >= (unsigned int)m_hashTable.size())
00444                 {
00445                         return B3_HASH_NULL;
00446                 }
00447 
00448                 int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00449                 while ((index != B3_HASH_NULL) && key.equals(m_keyArray[index]) == false)
00450                 {
00451                         index = m_next[index];
00452                 }
00453                 return index;
00454         }
00455 
00456         void    clear()
00457         {
00458                 m_hashTable.clear();
00459                 m_next.clear();
00460                 m_valueArray.clear();
00461                 m_keyArray.clear();
00462         }
00463 
00464 };
